name: Loren Homestay
address: Phong Nha, Quảng Bình thay bằng Đá Lỏn, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Loren Homestay có khu vườn, phòng chờ chung, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Phong Nha. Ngoài dịch vụ phòng, chỗ nghỉ này còn có sân chơi trẻ em. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Các căn tại khách sạn đi kèm khu vực ghế ngồi. Các phòng đều có ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có ban công và một số khác thì nhìn ra thành phố. Tất cả các phòng tại Loren Homestay có điều hòa và bàn làm việc.

Khách tại chỗ nghỉ sẽ có thể tận hưởng các hoạt động ở trong Phong Nha và khu vực xung quanh, như leo núi và đi xe đạp.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách Loren Homestay 39 km.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 giường đơn có ban công
review.comment_positive: The family was friendly, the lunch was delicious. We just needed a room to stay for 1 night but the room was very good.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 giường đơn có ban công
review.comment_positive: The hotel is in a calm location a short walk from the tourist area and attractions. The hosts were very keen to help and the free Breakfast was a big bonus
review.comment_negative: There wasn't anything I found poor about my stay

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The room is nice, good shower, comfy bed, the location by the river is great. You are close enough to town but far enough from town that it's quiet and peaceful. The host was very kind and helpful. We rented a motorbike through them and it was great.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: This was a fantastic stay. The location is by the son River. The room was perfect for my needs, spacious, simple, comfortable and warm (I am travelling in January). However, the highlight was the family who were so kind, warm and welcoming. They invited my to have dinner with them one night and I had an excellent time learning about the culture and the area. I was very grateful to have had such an accommodating family host me, so I highly recommend this homestay.

review.rating: Good place to rest your head
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_negative: Empty, not a very welcoming room, staff are not always around when you need them, no breakfast or coffee, literally just a place to sleep

review.room_type: Phòng 2 giường đơn có ban công
review.comment_positive:
Excellent service, the house is big and spacious, very clean and the rooms was as good as a 4 star hotel. They do a laundary service for very cheap.

The owners helped us out with tickets for our next destination, gave me and my friend a complementary beer before we left. They even gave us a lift to the bus stop so we didn't have to walk, also free of charge. We really felt at home.

I would recommend to anyone, and value for money!

review.room_type: Phòng 2 giường đơn có ban công
review.comment_positive: The place is located just in front of the lake and is really close to the the Phong Nha Ké Bang National Park. So perfect to visit the park.
review.comment_negative:
Communication with the host was very difficult because he doesn’t understand/speak any english at all and no effort. (Use vocal google trad)
Breakfast : no choice no good.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 giường đơn có ban công
review.comment_positive:
Prima, goede uitvalsbasis. Eigenaar doet er alles aan je van dienst te zijn ondanks bij hem Engels kan werkt Google Translate Prima.
Erg schoon. Broodje ei standaard als ontbijtje
review.comment_negative: Bed erg hard maar is wel een beetje standaard in Vietnam

review.room_type: Phòng 2 giường đơn có ban công
review.comment_negative:
Arrivée tardive pas assumée. J'ai téléphoné a plusieurs reprises avant qu'on me réponde, je n'ai eu accès à la chambre qu'une demi heure après le premier appel. 
Première chambre assignée n'était pas la bonne.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
